contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox handball league |name=Ekstraklasa |logo=| |pixels=100px |caption= |confed=[[European Handball Federation|EHF]] |founded=1939 |inaugural= |teams=12 |country={{POL}} |confed_cup=[[EHF Women's Champions League|Champions League]]<br>[[EHF Women's Cup Winners' Cup|Cup Winners' Cup]]<br>[[Women's EHF Cup|EHF Cup]]<br>[[Women's EHF Challenge Cup|Challenge Cup]] |champions= |most successful club = |website= |current= [[2011–12 Ekstraklasa (women's handball)|2011–12 season]] }} The '''Ekstraklasa''' is the top women's [[Team handball|handball]] league in [[Poland]]. It is organized by the [[Poland Handball Federation]]. The league comprises twelve teams. ==Teams 2012/2013== * [[MKS Zagłębie Lubin (women's handball)|KGHM Metraco Zagłębie Lubin]] * Vistal Łączpol Gdynia * [[SPR Lublin SSA]] * [[AZS Politechnika Koszalin|KU AZS Politechnika Koszalińska]] * [[Ruch Chorzów|KPR Ruch Chorzów]] * [[Kolporter Kielce|KSS Kielce]] * KPR Jelenia Góra * [[Piotrcovia Piotrków Trybunalski|MKS Piotrcovia Piotrków Trybunalski]] * [[EB Start Elbląg|EKS Start Elbląg]] * AZS AWF Gardinia Wrocław * MKS Olimpia/Beskid Nowy Sącz * Aussie Latocha Sambor Tczew ==Teams 2011/2012 - League table== # Vistal Łączpol Gdynia # [[MKS Zagłębie Lubin (women's handball)|KGHM Metraco Zagłębie Lubin]] # [[SPR Lublin SSA]] # [[AZS Politechnika Koszalin|KU AZS Politechnika Koszalińska]] # [[Ruch Chorzów|KPR Ruch Chorzów]] # [[Kolporter Kielce|KSS Kielce]] # KPR Jelenia Góra # [[Piotrcovia Piotrków Trybunalski|MKS Piotrcovia Piotrków Trybunalski]] # [[EB Start Elbląg|EKS Start Elbląg]] # AZS AWF Gardinia Wrocław # SPR Pogoń Baltica Szczecin # UKS Finepharm Polkowice ==List of champions== {{col-start}} {{col-4}} * 1939 -
